item.description:
Alma Mater Studio is an extracurricular learning center in Lexington, Massachusetts offering classes for kids aged 4 - 12 in art, languages, drama, and mathematics.
Please join us for a housewarming party/open house Sept 8th. The kids will design their own stained-glass window, stage a show with  hand-made puppets, try out costumes from a real play. Hope to see you there!

﻿﻿﻿(781)325-8285

﻿﻿http://www.facebook.com/almamaterstudio

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: AlmaMater Studio in Lexington - Open House
